---
title: "Binomial 40 Results Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rbinom-0.1-40.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Binom0.1.40Call <- stream_in(file("rbinom-0.1-40-Call-Revised.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Binom0.1.40Result <- stream_in(file("rbinom-0.1-40_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Binom.01.40.OpenAI <- left_join(Binom0.1.40Call,Binom0.1.40Result)
Full.Binom.01.40 <- left_join(Binom0.1.40$params, Binom.01.40.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Binom.01.40.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Binom.01.40$Outcome <- map_chr(Binom0.1.40$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Binom0.1.40Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Binom.01.40$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Binom.01.40, file="Full.Binom.01.40.RData")
```
